display inline grid.description: Set up an inline grid container

grid template column.description: Set up space-separated column track list

grid template row.description: Set up space-separated row track list

grid template areas.description: Set up named areas for a grid

grid gap.description: Specify the size of gaps between rows and columns

grid row gap.description: Specify the size of the gap between rows

grid column gap.description: Specify the size of the gap between columns

grid row start.description: Specify up the start row of a line based placement

grid row end.description: Specify the end row of a line based placement

grid row.description: Specify the start and end rows of a line based placement

grid column start.description: Set up the start column of a line based placement

grid column end.description: Set up the end column of a line based placement

grid column.description: Set up the start and end columns of a line based placement

grid area.description: Place items into a named area

grid auto rows.description: specify the size of implicitly-created row tracks.

grid auto columns.description: specify the size of implicitly-created column tracks.
